subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The American John Isner is the only man outside the top four (Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, Roger Federer, Andy Murray) to have two wins over members of that group in 2012.
snippet: The American John Isner is the only man outside the top four (Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, Roger Federer, Andy Murray) to have two wins over members of that group in 2012.
